data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 594 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of South Andros, Bahamas
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of South Andros, Bahamas.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of South Andros to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, cause the 594 believers in South Andros to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of South Andros.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in South Andros, Bahamas to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of South Andros.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.section_summary:
the state of South Andros, Bahamas has a population of 1,500.

We estimate South Andros has 594 people who might know Jesus, 823 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 83 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
